text: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe pannarase pavāraṇāya puṇṇāya puṇṇamāya rattiyā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto abbhokāse nisinno hoti
edit: Tena kho pana samayena bhagavā tadahuposathe pannarase pavāraṇāya puṇṇāya puṇṇamāya rattiyā bhikkhusaṅghaparivuto abbhokāse nisinno hoti

translations.transtext: 145. By that time, the Blessed One sat in the open air, surrounded by a group of monks, in the Uposatha Day, the fifteenth [lunar day], the end of the rain retreat (pavāraṇā), a full-moon night.
